name: xemote-api
description: The Xemote API project is a back-end web application built using Node.js and Express. This API simulates the functionality of an online product store, allowing users to read, create, delete and update a collection of products. The Xemote Mock project is a showcase of my skills in full-stack development. This project demonstrates my ability to create a functional and user-friendly interface that aligns with industry standards.
author: Tyrone B. Dunn
